title: Building The Ultimate Thunderbolt Gaming Setup
description: We turned the Dell XPS 13 into a gaming PC with a single Thunderbolt 3 cable.  The Fastest Gaming PC I've Ever Built:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:   #thunderbolt3 #eGFX #thunderboltgaming #sponsored
